title: Music Soundtrack - Industrial Electronic Rock (fully interactive)
description: The sound of Industrial music is here in one easy-to-implement music package.  10 complete tracks divided into over 150 individual stems, set up to layer easily into an interactive game score.
longDescription:
180+ files / 10 complete tracks, split into parts for seamless loops and dynamic, interactive score / Sound design one-shot FX and loops


Preview here: Industrial Electronic Rock Soundtrack asset pack


This music package is everything needed for a complete game score. Inspired by Industrial artists from the 1980s through 2020 it is professionally composed, produced and edited to be custom-fit to scenes or levels easily. Every part of each track is split out into a separate loop or one-shot with filenames indicating the key, tempo and length of music - making it easy to set up an interactive soundtrack for video games. Aggressive synthesizers, guitars and drums are mixed with metallic sound design and glitchy, noisy effects. The pack also includes several tracks of ambient electronica for background ambience in the chiller moments of your game, as well as a bonus folder of gritty sound design effects.


Perfect for Science Fiction, Cyberpunk, futuristic scenes, mechanized environments, rock club scenes, raves and more.
technicalDetails:
